A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Totally disappointed. Not what I was expecting. This might be the worst entry yet. The big reveal of Rey’s parents was a big let down. Leia flying through space...ridiculous. Not letting Luke fight Kylo except thru a hologram...terrible. Luke dies from projecting himself through space??? At least Obi-won was actually struck down by Vader!!! Rey barely gets any actual Jedi training yet she can move rocks! Kylo kills his Master already?? Come on really? I was just disgusted. Mr. Lucas please comeback and fix this mess they have done with your baby!!!! 😐
